game.name: COSETTE: THE UNTITLED GAME
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Turn Notifications
game.shortDescription: An adventure game that combines escape room challenges, side-scrolling exploration, combat, and text-based gameplay. With nearly 30 different game endings and over 40 original CGs awaiting your discovery.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An adventure game that combines escape room challenges, side-scrolling exploration, combat, and text-based gameplay. With nearly 30 different game endings and over 40 original CGs awaiting your discovery.
